description:
Alex is back! This lean, mean, 19 year old is a tough guy, but you'd never think so until you get to know him. He's extremely sexual, and loves to show off his 9 inch cock.
Yes, Alex is blessed with the kind of tool that, he says, brings every woman to their knees. Well, he's back here to let the monster loose again, and based on the comments we've received about him, he's sure to please once again.
title: Alex
